allOf.title: An extension specifically for the timber.io service. Any log event coming out of timber.io will adhere to the additions here.

$schema.description: The URL for the Timber log line JSON schema that the current document adheres to.

application_id.description: The application ID this log line is a member of.

id.description: The unique identifer for this log line. This identifier is created and assigned by Timber.

formatted_message.description: The log event message, formatting preserved.

parsed_message.description: Internal object used to hold structured data passed in the message itself. Clients should not send this data, Timber will automatically parse your message and place the data here.
